t:
I visited my brother in prison who was serving a life sentence.


Seeing that innocent man confused over a crime he didn't actually commit made me exceptionally happy.
c:
It's no doubt who did it actually. It's not over.



#brother #prison #visit #framed #crime #innocence #happy #hidden
